root: ^Yo, G. Protocol says I got to consider you a suspect.
^Gonna need your name, occupation, home planet.
^Home planet: Terra-2, baby! Terra-2, can I get a WOOT WOOT!
^C'mon, we Terrans got to stick together, man!
^Moving on, are you sure you didn't just misplace your memmory gun?
^Charles has a perfect memory, he don't forget things like that.
^I know you one-headers are slow, but you gotta keep up!
^I went into the evidence room three relative days ago, solving cases mad fast, the usual.
^I was all alone, and nothing happened.
^But when I left the room, my memory gun was looong gone.
^Well, either you misplaced it, or the culprit wiped you.
^Yup. Sucks being on the recieving end of that thing, that's for sure.
^Since your memory is wiped, you're compromised.
^By protocol, you must sit this one out.
^Ayup. They can't let the GOAT do all the work around here,
^they gotta let some of the other detectives get something done.
^You're insufferable. I may come back with more questions.

DONE: ^Yo, you really need help that fast.
